com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv

Class SCCodecsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.SCCodecsManager

  • public class SCCodecsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class keeps instances of various codecs and provides access to them. asmishra

    • Method Detail

      • getCodec

        public static org.owasp.esapi.codecs.Codec getCodec(java.lang.String codecType)
        Returns a codec for the codec type passed as the argument.

        If corresponding codec is not yet initialized, it is initialized and returned. Same instance is returned for any subsequent call with the same codec type.

        List of platform provided codecs type:

        • #CSS_CODEC
        • #HTML_ENTITY_CODEC
        • #JAVASCRIPT_CODEC
        • #MYSQL_CODEC_MYSQL_MODE
        • #MYSQL_CODEC_ANSI_MODE
        • #ORACLE_CODEC
        • #PERCENT_CODEC
        • #UNIX_CODEC
        • #VBSCRIPT_CODEC
        • #WINDOWS_CODEC
        codecType codec type codec for that type

      • setCodec

        public static void setCodec(java.lang.String codecType,
                            org.owasp.esapi.codecs.Codec codec)
        Set codec for a specific codec type. codecType type of the codec codec codec
